title: Splitting the bill among a group

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Would you like the bill split between all of you or separately?

turns.user_response_option_en: Just to confirm, could you let us know how much the drinks will cost on the separate bill?

turns.user_response_option_en: Thank you so much, that makes things easier for us. Could we also get a pen to write in the tip?

turns.ai_conversation_starter_en: Sure, I can definitely do that for you.
turns.user_response_option_en: Great, thank you for your help. Do you accept multiple payment methods if we want to pay with both cash and card?

turns.user_response_option_ko: 네, 도와주셔서 감사합니다. 현금과 카드로 모두 결제하려는 경우 여러 결제 방법을 사용할 수 있나요?
